# The `IPDBDataStream` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/ipdbdatastream">IPDBDataStream</a> defines an interface used to represent a stream consisting of a name and a series of records whose formats depend on the particular stream type. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::pdb::IPDBDataStream</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/ipdbdatastream">IPDBDataStream</a> defines an interface used to represent a stream consisting of a name and a series of records whose formats depend on the particular stream type.
